about_the_game:
Gehenna War

Mature Advisory : contains graphic and written content of a mature nature, including violence, sexual themes, and strong language. Reader discretion is advised.

The Eternal Struggle at Your Doorstep

From incessant intrigue to blazing action!  Gehenna War  brings the machinations of the elders and secret societies to your chronicle. Hunt the elders who were supposedly Beckoned away. Do you fight for the will of an ancient, a chance at the forbidden sin of Diablerie, or to protect what truly matters to you?

Gehenna War  provides material both for players and Storytellers to make the game sing, focusing on fast-paced action and how to weave it into stories and chronicles.

Gehenna War  is a sourcebook for  Vampire: The Masquerade , a Storytelling Game of Personal and Political Horror

Features

  • An overview of the Gehenna War and its impact on the major Kindred sects

  • Rules for creating action-focused characters for action chronicles along with pre-written stories to drop into any chronicle

  • New combat options and equipment and distinct factions fighting in the Gehenna War

  • Advice for using Bestial Failures and Messy Criticals in any chronicle

  • Emphasizes action conflict including chases, gunfights, dueling, infiltration

  • Provides information on new factions

At a Glance:

  • For Ages: 18+

  • Game Type: Roleplaying Game Sourcebook

  • Full Color

content_descriptors.notes: Mature Advisory : contains graphic artistic and written content of a mature nature, including violence, sexual themes, and strong language. Reader discretion is advised.
